ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:28:49 [Issue ID 4000-732832] urn:comicvine:4000-732832 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:35:02. [Issue ID 2099233]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Mary has been betrayed and imprisoned in the Woman in Black’s underground lair, and has been given a choice: use Mystere’s powers of necromancy to do the Woman in Black’s bidding, or face the Blacksmith’s soul-sucking hammer. Will Mary find a way to destroy this evil—and immortal—woman, or will she succumb to the grave circumstances she’s found herself in? Find out in this pulse-stopping finale!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Geebo Vigonte & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Riveiro & Grostieta | 2 | C | Cover C | Nelly Jimenez | 3 | D | Cover D | Martin Coccolo & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 | E | Retailer Special Collectible Cover, Limited to 300 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | Retailer Special Collectible Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | G | 2020 New Year's Eve 15 Year Crystal Anniversary Collectible Cover, Limited to 250 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
